testcase.classname: F01_Register | user can register with new accounts
testcase.name: user can register in website
testcase.system-out: Given user open register page...............................................passed And user select gender type.................................................passed And user enter fristname "nora" and lastname "Zakeria"......................passed And user enter brithday.....................................................passed And user enter email........................................................passed And user enter password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed When user click register button.............................................passed Then user registered successfully...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user can login to website
testcase.name: user could login with vaild email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter email "Nh@gmail.com" and password "P@ssw0rd".................passed When user press login button................................................passed Then user can login successfully............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | user can login to website
testcase.name: user could login with invaild email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed And user enter email "email@gmail.com" and password "P@ssw0rd"..............passed When user press login button................................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currency | user can show item price according to selected currency
testcase.name: when user select Euro Symbol ("€") shown on the 4 products
testcase.system-out: Given user select currency Euro.............................................passed Then Symbol (€) is shown on the products displayed in Home page.............passed

testcase.system-out: Given user enter Product_Name as"book"......................................passed When user press search button...............................................passed Then result search by as "book" appear successfully.........................passed

testcase.classname: F06_HomeSliders | user could click on slider on home
testcase.name: user could click on 1st slider on home

failure.message: Assertion 1st slider fail expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]

testcase.failure:
When user click on slider_1.................................................passed Then user direct to Nokia Lumia page........................................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: Assertion 1st slider fail expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] at org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:110) at org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:1413) at org.testng.Assert.assertEqualsImpl(Assert.java:149) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:131) at org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:655) at org.example.StepDefs.D06_homeSlidersStepDef.userDirectToNokiaLumiaPage(D06_homeSlidersStepDef.java:26) at ✽.user direct to Nokia Lumia page(file:///C:/Users/noura.zakarya/nopcommerce_project/src/main/resources/Ecommerce_Features/F06_HomeSliders.feature:7)

testcase.classname: F06_HomeSliders | user could click on slider on home
testcase.name: user could click on 2nd slider on home

failure.message: Assertion 2nd slider fail expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/iphone-6] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/]
